snippet: New England’s defensive statistics have been downright unimpressive, but not in the all-important category of forcing turnovers.
abstract: New England Patriots lead the AFC with 41 turnovers over 16 games, with at least one in every game; team is busy preparing for upcoming playoff game against Houston Texans.
lead_paragraph: New England’s defensive statistics have been downright unimpressive, but not in the all-important category of forcing turnovers.

headline.main: Forcing Turnovers Is the Patriots’ Way
headline.print_headline: Forcing Turnovers Is the Patriots’ Way
